data.meta_description: Spanish Super Cup - Supercopa de España 2018. Sevilla - FC Barcelona. Stadium, Date and Kick-off time.
data.text:
Barcelona Events 2024

Spanish Super Cup - Supercopa de España 2018

Sevilla - FC Barcelona

Date of game: Sunday 12th August 2018

Kick-off time: KO time 22:00 (CET Spanish time

Stadium: Stade Ibn Batouta in Tangier, Morocco

Where to watch in Spain: La 1

The Spanish Supercup is played in August every year. It is traditionally a two match encounter between the winners of the previous Spanish seasons league and cup called La Liga and the Copa del Rey.

The Supercup winners are the Superchampions of Spain - supercampeones de España. If the same team wins both titles - as FC Barcelona did in 2017/18 season - then the runners up of the Copa del Rey final play the Liga winners in the Supercopa de España final.

In 2018, for the first time ever, the Spanish Super Cup will not be played in Spain but will be played in Tangier, Morocco. Also in 2018, for the first time ever, the Spanish Super Cup will not be played over two legs but in one final match. Also this will be the first official game in a Spanish football competition in which video-arbitration technology ( VAR ) will be used.

The Supercopa de España 2018 match will kick off at the Stade Ibn Batouta in Tangier on Sunday, 12 August at 21:00 BST which is 10pm Spanish time

This will be the first Barcelona game for new star Arturo Vidal who joins Barcelona from Bayern Munich
